column2: Allow AI and players Both use Nomadic Subjugation (EXPERIMENTAL)
Allow Only Player Versus Player Nomadic Subjugation (EXPERIMENTAL)
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can call a warherd against the nations of order, razing them and scourging their lands for the glory of the Dark Gods!
The merciless herd of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have wrought destruction and ruin in your lands, destroying any building they came across and hunting down people like monsters from living nightmare.
Scourging and searching the land of [Root.Location.GetName] you've encountered wandering warherd. Civilization crumbles under the hooved steps of the blessed children of Chaos.
Scourging and spoiling the land of [From.Location.GetName] you've extended your fame and integrated wandering warherd. Civilization crumbles under the hooved steps of the blessed children of Chaos.
The land of [Root.Location.GetName] is barren wasteland where nothing grows and no semblance of order remains and the herd is growing restless for new places to plunder and scourge.
A legendary despoiler who has wrought war and destruction upon lands of the Lands of Order.
This character is known as one of mightiest Beastman Warlords of their time having savaged numerous countries, all in name of the Ruinous Powers.
